allQuestion.explanation: Could the object of your affections return your feelings, or is it a lost cause?

answers.text: Rarely or never - not yet, at least!
A lot. You seem to be the first person he or she tells things to.
Sporadically - lots some days, then not at all others.

allQuestion.text: How often does he or she talk to you?

allQuestion.explanation: Could the object of your affections return your feelings, or is it a lost cause?

answers.text: He or she keeps looking - but at you? Maybe you just happen to be where he or she is staring.
Your crush blushes and quickly looks away.
He or she holds your gaze and smiles.
He or she looks away with no expression.

allQuestion.text: Your crush is looking at you and you catch his or her gaze. What is his/her reaction?

allQuestion.explanation: Could the object of your affections return your feelings, or is it a lost cause?

answers.text: Say yes if he or she had no other plans.
Give you a weird look and say 'no.'
Excitedly say 'yes' and drop everything to do it.
Ask when, where or why, but ultimately schedule a time to do it.

allQuestion.text: If you asked your crush to do something with you, how do you think he or she would react?
